title: Logistics Specialist Job in Jacksonville, FL
description: <p>Do you have logistics experience in transportation, shipping, and or warehouses? Are you known for finding a more efficient/cost effective way of doing things? Contact us today!<br />&nbsp;<br /><strong>Job Responsibilities:</strong></p><li>Taking inbound calls&nbsp;and negotiating shipment/freight&nbsp;costs</li><li>Proficiency in the shipping process and monitoring of shipments</li><li>Ensure accurate inventory control</li><li>Vendor relations</li><li>Identify problems and solutions that incorporate best practice&nbsp;</li><p><strong>Job Requirements:</strong></p><li>Bachelor&#39;s Degree strongly preferred</li><li>Comprehensive knowledge of shipping &amp; freight</li><li>Cost saving solutions experience</li><li>Strong attention to detail</li><li>Proficiency in cloud-based reporting preferred</li><p>&nbsp;<br />&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
